Today in Cornwall, Sennen Cove is offering some fun with 2 ft @ 5s NW and a fresh 18 mph N wind; best during the early tide window from 08:21 to 16:35. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 1 ft @ 5s NW and fresh NW winds, making it a quiet day. The day after, expect 5 ft @ 6s NW with fresh onshore winds, likely blown out. Best: today.
